OUTPUT: ['**List all common costs** - Create an itemized list of shared expenses such as rent, utilities, groceries, and any other recurring bills or purchases.', '**Decide on sharing methodology** - Agree whether expenses will be divided equally, proportionally based on income/usage, or another fair system that all parties are comfortable with.', '**Keep detailed records** - Use a spreadsheet to track who owes what and for what items; this ensures transparency and accountability.', '**Set up regular payments** - Determine how often expenses will be settled (e.g., weekly, bi-weekly) and set reminders or automatic transfers if possible.', '**Communicate regularly** - Hold a monthly meeting to discuss shared expenses, address any discrepancies, and make plans for future purchases.']
